tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Having a dentist in the neighbourhood, who has an excellent well  , friendly staff and a mobile booster is always a boon. My visit to the clinic was for  my child cleaning and was really impressed by Dr. Pritee Ray treatment and time savers to explain how to keep the teeth healthy. I surely recommend to visit 'the dentist' and console Dr Pritee Ray for your dental hygiene.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: She is kind and a patient doctor. She will listen to you and explain everything to you in detail. What I liked best about her was the way she calmed me down during such long and frustrating sessions as I had multiple issues and the way she went above and beyond her duties. Thank you so much for your kindness.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review:
Doctor Pritee was very supportive and showed lot of patience in handling. She had to wait multiple times for me during the extraction and give me short breaks but she was happy to wait. I felt like some one my own was helping me out.


Post extraction, on the next day she was doing follow up, which was very nice of her.

Thank you doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor Pritee is nice doctor. She explained the issue in detail. I was always scared of visiting dentist but after having treatment with Dr Pritee that fear has gone. Have done the scaling first time and no pain/issues after that. Strongly recommend Dr Pritee for any dental issue.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Pritee was quick in analysing the issue and treating the same resulting in immediate relief from the pain I was going through.
